explains: n. 竞争者，对手；选手，参赛者

sentences.en: The opposite of an opportunist is a competitor.
sentences.cn: 与机会主义者对立的是竞争者。

sentences.en: His success was beyond belief since his competitor was so experienced.
sentences.cn: 他的成功令人难以置信，因为他的对手非常有经验。

sentences.en: The girl I viewed as a competitor congratulated me on my contest results.
sentences.cn: 那个被我视为竞争对手的女孩就我取得的竞赛成绩向我表示祝贺。
